title: Extra Academic Activities
text: Extra Academic Activities often referred as EAA are compulsory courses for the first 4 semesters of the undergraduate students. They are of one credits and include NSO Health and Fitness , NSO sports (Basketball, Badminton, Cricket, Table tennis and other sports), NSS , NCC, and NCA. A separate course NSO Yoga has also been a part of EAA since the academic year 2015-16. NCA has been a part of EAA since the academic year 2020-21
